concept.title: Learning Object Map/Learning Group Map Notes

conbody.p:
Random notes:
On a mapref specifying a navigation title and locktitle has no effect because the title of the submap is ignored for the purpose of constructing the navigation hierarchy.
On reference to external resource must specify scope="external" and the @format attribute.
Must have a per-element .attributes parameter entity, even if the value is just a reference to another parameter entity.
Learning group map must declare its dependency on the learningMap domain in its @domains attribute. Ditto learning object map.
Attribute declarations for learningGroupMap and learningObjectMap don't follow the standard coding reqs: everything must be in the *.attributes parameter entity declaration or in the @class attribute declaration.
Need OASIS-style public ID for the simpleTopicrefConstraints module
Need to allow optional <reltable> in learningObjectMap and learningGroupMap
